snippet.title: Alan Wake: The Signal - Trailer
snippet.description:
Alan Wake's first DLC, The Signal, is now available on the Xbox Live Marketplace!
------------------

Alan Wake: The Signal - 
In this first downloadable content pack we find Wake tracing a threat unlike anything he's ever encountered before -- and yet one he's intimately familiar with. In order to make sense of it all, he must follow the Signal.

For more info on Alan Wake head over to the official Alan Wake site at http://www.alanwake.com/ or follow us on our social media channels for lots of free Alan Wake giveaways, competitions, exclusive content and the latest news: Facebook - http://www.facebook/alanwake or Twitter - http://twitter.com/remedyalerts
